author: Yuvaraj, Rajamanickam and Murugappan, M and Ibrahim, Norlinah Mohamed and Omar, Mohd Iqbal and Sundaraj, Kenneth and Mohamad, Khairiyah and Palaniappan, Ramaswamy and Satiyan, Marimuthu
title: Emotion classification in Parkinson's disease by higher-order spectra and power spectrum features using EEG signals: A comparative study
